str2: Therefore, then. Apparently a primary word; certainly, or accordingly.

parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Passive - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: From dikaios; to render just or innocent.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
Blood, literally, figuratively or specially; by implication, bloodshed, also kindred.
More, rather. Neuter of the comparative of the same as malista; more) or rather.

parse: Verb - Future Indicative Passive - 1st Person Plural
str2: To save, heal, preserve, rescue. From a primary sos; to save, i.e. Deliver or protect.
From, away from. A primary particle; 'off, ' i.e. Away, in various senses.
From oregomai; properly, desire, i.e., violent passion (justifiable) abhorrence); by implication punishment.
A primary preposition denoting the channel of an act; through.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
